third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Both Ermes and Levan are in incredible shape. It's not an illusion. The stronger one will win, but it doesn't mean the other is weak.

Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Puts all of himself into the sport

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Alex Kurdecha is in the best shape ever, having burned the ships after previous losses. It's uncertain if it will be enough to win.

Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Had a few losses in a row, can't afford another loss

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Good luck to both Ryan Belanger and Allen Ford.

Ryan Belanger.previous_match_summary: Superstar, very good at analyzing the sport

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Joseph Meranto will have a good match.
